name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Revival ⧸ 重大告知あり！【#角巻わため生誕祭2024】 [fcFwvfav6mQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: A transition scene with graphics and a black screen.

subtitles.original: 出すな その手は
subtitles.english: Don't reach out that hand.

subtitles.original: 吐いた 綺麗に
subtitles.english: I spat it out, so beautifully.

subtitles.original: 罪のオムサービス 言葉に溺れ
subtitles.english: Sinful omuservice, drowning in words.

subtitles.original: 愛したいな 活かしたいな
subtitles.english: I want to love, I want to keep alive.

subtitles.original: 壊したいな 会いたいな
subtitles.english: I want to break, I want to meet.

subtitles.original: 世界が僕らを嫌うなら
subtitles.english: If the world hates us...

subtitles.original: 火だるま 目を獲って喰らう
subtitles.english: On fire, I'll take out your eyes and eat them.

subtitles.original: ワン、ツー さっきまでしがみついてたガム
subtitles.english: One, two, the gum I was clinging onto until just now.

subtitles.original: ブルー 赤い目して あどけなさが
subtitles.english: Blue, with red eyes, your innocence...

subtitles.original: 残酷 天使のツラして
subtitles.english: Cruel, wearing an angel's face,

subtitles.original: 憂いながらも手遊んだ
subtitles.english: I played even while grieving.

subtitles.original: 弱者 敗者 踏みつけて
subtitles.english: Trampling on the weak, the losers,

subtitles.original: サイコ！サイコ！
subtitles.english: Psycho! Psycho!

subtitles.original: 治療してよ
subtitles.english: Treat me.

subtitles.original: カルテはめちゃくちゃ
subtitles.english: My medical chart is a mess.

subtitles.original: 刺して、ほら その細い針
subtitles.english: Stab me, look, with that thin needle.

subtitles.original: 不可解 痛い 鳴らなく響いても
subtitles.english: Inexplicable, painful, even if it echoes without ringing.

subtitles.original: 遵守 溶けて証拠 これが麻薬でしょ
subtitles.english: Compliance, melting proof, this must be a drug.

subtitles.original: 毒に染まる愛 情熱的な恋
subtitles.english: Love stained in poison, a passionate love.

subtitles.original: 僕はどこまで行けるのか
subtitles.english: How far can I go?

subtitles.original: 醜いの 汚いの
subtitles.english: It's ugly, it's dirty,

subtitles.original: 美しいの 素晴らしいの
subtitles.english: It's beautiful, it's wonderful,

subtitles.original: 時代よ 僕を受け止めて
subtitles.english: Era, accept me!

subtitles.original: 私、さっきも聞いたよ
subtitles.english: I heard it just now, too.

subtitles.original: ドロドロの ストレス社会
subtitles.english: A muddy, stressful society.

subtitles.original: 僕はひたすらこの楽園を生き抜いてやろう
subtitles.english: I'll just survive in this paradise.

subtitles.original: 火だるま 目を獲って喰らう
subtitles.english: On fire, I'll take out your eyes and eat them.

subtitles.original: ワン、ツー さっきまでしがみついてたガム
subtitles.english: One, two, the gum I was clinging onto until just now.

subtitles.original: ブルー 赤い目して 血しぶき踊れ
subtitles.english: Blue, with red eyes, let the blood spray dance.

subtitles.original: 残酷 天使のツラして 憂いながらも手遊んだ
subtitles.english: Cruel, wearing an angel's face, I played even while grieving.

subtitles.original: 僕がいつか消えるまで
subtitles.english: Until I disappear someday,

subtitles.original: ただ遊んで
subtitles.english: ...just play.

subtitles.original: 弱者 敗者 踏みつけて
subtitles.english: Trampling on the weak, the losers,

subtitles.original: サイコ！サイコ！
subtitles.english: Psycho! Psycho!

subtitles.original: When you look up at the night sky, what do you see?
subtitles.english: When you look up at the night sky, what do you see?

subtitles.original: The glowing beauty in the twilight, no mystery.
subtitles.english: The glowing beauty in the twilight, no mystery.

subtitles.original: Now watch me set the scene and light it all up.
subtitles.english: Now watch me set the scene and light it all up.

subtitles.original: When the time has come I will be rising high.
subtitles.english: When the time has come I will be rising high.

subtitles.original: Glory for me like a red light whenever you see.
subtitles.english: Glory for me like a red light whenever you see.

subtitles.original: My shine!
subtitles.english: My shine!

subtitles.original: Oh, you can't deny!
subtitles.english: Oh, you can't deny!

subtitles.original: It's pulling you in like gravity.
subtitles.english: It's pulling you in like gravity.

subtitles.original: You will be bowing on your knees, yeah.
subtitles.english: You will be bowing on your knees, yeah.

subtitles.original: Pulling you in close to me.
subtitles.english: Pulling you in close to me.

subtitles.original: Watch my glory, am I following or leading the high tide?
subtitles.english: Watch my glory, am I following or leading the high tide?

subtitles.original: My reign will never stop.
subtitles.english: My reign will never stop.

subtitles.original: The time begins so right to hit the top.
subtitles.english: The time begins so right to hit the top.

subtitles.original: Let my power ignite.
subtitles.english: Let my power ignite.

subtitles.original: Following or leading the high tide.
subtitles.english: Following or leading the high tide.

subtitles.original: I can be a bright enigma, it's no surprise.
subtitles.english: I can be a bright enigma, it's no surprise.

subtitles.original: But you'll give in to the brilliance like a moth to a light.
subtitles.english: But you'll give in to the brilliance like a moth to a light.

subtitles.original: Pray hard to keep the light delicious.
subtitles.english: Pray hard to keep the light delicious.

subtitles.original: You succumb to my bright radiance, yeah.
subtitles.english: You succumb to my bright radiance, yeah.

subtitles.english: The time begins so right to hit the top.

subtitles.original: Let my power ignite.
